about.title: ABOUT ME
about.paragraph1: Passionate about technology, I love to explore every facet of a digital project.
about.paragraph2: From creating a PHP website to developing the front-end of a showcase site and conducting UX/UI analysis, I have developed a strong versatility.
about.paragraph3: This technical curiosity reflects my personality: eager for challenges, open to new experiences, and always ready to build—whether it's code or my next trip.

items.title: Obtained CESS - Plurielle Maritime High School
items.description: Upper secondary education diploma, marking the end of my pre-university studies and the beginning of my specialization in digital fields.

items.title: Studies in Multimedia Writing at ISFSC
items.description: Intensive training focused on digital content creation: web development (front & back), interface design (UX/UI), project management, web analytics, and digital communication strategies.

items.title: Shopify Store Management
items.description: End-to-end management of an e-commerce store: order processing, theme customization (Front-End), product management, and user experience (UX) optimization.

items.title: Creation of Fast 'N Friends Website
items.description: Design and development of a student carpooling site. This academic project, built with PHP and WordPress, allowed me to practice user profile management and responsive interface creation.

items.title: Creation of an E-learning Platform
items.description: Development of an online training site using WordPress. The main goal was to structure a complex learning path and design an intuitive and engaging user interface (UX/UI) for the learner.

items.title: Internship at Nowa Market
items.description: Internship in web development and digital marketing. My main mission was the end-to-end design (UX/UI in Figma) and development of the showcase website for Nowa Logistics. A comprehensive first professional experience, blending technical skills and strategy.

items.title: Creation of my Personal Portfolio
items.description: Design and development of this portfolio. This project, coded in vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, serves as a showcase of my skills in front-end development, interactive design, and i18n implementation.
